definitions.text: a state of agitation or turbulent change or development
examples: the political ferment produced new leadership

definitions.text: a substance capable of bringing about fermentation
a process in which an agent causes an organic substance to break down into simpler substances; especially, the anaerobic breakdown of sugar into alcohol
be in an agitated or excited state
work up into agitation or excitement

examples: We ferment the grapes for a very long time to achieve high alcohol content
The vintner worked the wine in big oak vats
The cream has turned--we have to throw it out
